2AF026D4.Line7.A9F43: They will burn on the pyre before the day is out! How could you be so rash? When the Reverend Mother--

3460A1F6.VoiceDir9.FEF63: smug but cold. This is a threat.

3FFB0AE5.Line17.A9F43: But, Sister Octavia, please, take better care of yourself. The Cathedral is stronger with you on your feet than in a sick bed.

5D8555C1.Line1.FEF63: Yes. You did well, the demon is truly banished. I'm impressed you were able to copy the ritual so quickly. It took me ages to master.

729039D2.Line11.FEF63: If I am to be tied to that horrific pyre, then you shall be there with me!

903136B2.VoiceDir17.A9F43: earnest. Octavia is important to you. more warmly than you would normally speak to someone.

90FBAD52.Line5.A9F43: Sister Octavia, you are all right! But these people have engaged in blasphemy of the highest sort! Lying! Stealing holy implements! Brutalizing a priest of the Cathedral!

A6069163.Line15.A9F43: I suppose I have been away from Margrave overlong. I should return swiftly.

C2C6659F.VoiceDir11.FEF63: cold, direct. This is a threat.

C5573BC9.Line9.FEF63: Oh? And what will you tell Prava? That you allowed a commoner to so easily deceive her holy representative? That you abandoned your flock in Margrave and left them with no guidance from the Light?

CC8EBBEE.VoiceDir1.FEF63: Groggy, weak, waking up from a horrible nightmare.

F63CBD30.VoiceDir15.A9F43: backpedalling from a threat. Trying to escape and awkward conversation as quickly as possible.
